alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 1:20PM MST until December 31 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, except 4 to 8 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Southern Twin Falls County, Southwest Highlands and Owyhee Mountains zones. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands
